name: Petzl Picchu Helmet
description: Kids will be happy to wear this skate-inspired helmet for both climbing and cycling. It’s light and comfortable so it won’t get in the way of a good time, but it’s safe and durable to satisfy parents.Shell is lightweight and durable, injection-moulded ABS.Expanded polystyrene inner liner absorbs impacts.Narrower webbing is more comfortable, and the chin strap buckle is placed off-centre to further increase comfort.Foam lining is removable and washable.Includes three sets of stickers, one is a reflective set.CE and UIAA certified for climbing. Meets CE EN 1078/CSPC safety standard for five-year-olds and older, and CSPC US safety standard.
